data.actual_result: Text is at the top of the box, offset above where the cursor is
data.expected_result: Text in the box should be aligned with the cursor, and not jump up
data.short_description: Text gets offset in box when you open the drop down for adding undetected game
data.steps_to_repro: - Open user settings - Go to "Games" - Click "Add it!" to add an undetected game - Click on drop down - Observe "Select..." jumps up - Additionally, anything selected from the drop down will be offset (but not typed text)
